page.title: 11Unfinished Church CSP
page.content:
In Oval Way,a residential road not far from Gerrards Cross Station,is an un- finished church.It consists of 1/3 of the original building planned!
All Saints Church was begun in 1912 but because of World War 1 was unfinished. After the war,the expected housing development near the new station never took place so a large church was not needed.The designer was Temple Moore. Only the north aisle exsists. The church abruptly ends at one side in a rough wall.In recent years stained glass windows have been put in that wall.Inside are 3 sanctuary lamps dedicated in the memory of a local soldier killed at Passchendaele.The church,unfinished though it is,is now a listed building,as the oak woodwork inside is very fine.
